articles.title: North America and Asia might collide to form next supercontinent on Earth, predicts scientist - WION
articles.description: North America and Asia might collide to form next supercontinent on Earth, predicts scientist
articles.content:
Today, we have seven continents, but an intriguing future awaits us. 
Geophysicist Ross Mitchell has recently unveiled his new book: "The Next Supercontinent" in which he talks about not only the pa… [+2228 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Delhi HC refuses to interfere with Asian Games trials exemption to Vinesh Phogat, Bajrang Punia - The Indian Express
articles.description: Vinesh Phogat (53kg) and Bajrang Punia (65kg) were given direct entry for the Asian Games by the IOA's ad-hoc committee, while other wrestlers will have to earn their places in the Indian squad through selection trials.
articles.content:
The Delhi High Court Saturday refused to interfere with the exemption granted to top wrestlers Vinesh Phogat and Bajrang Punia from Asian Games trials.
Justice Subramonium Prasad dismissed the petit… [+949 chars]
